ConnectionStatistics.description: HTTP connection statistics since last reset.
ConnectionStatistics.longDescription: Object describing the HTTP connection statistics since last reset.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BytesReceived.description: A property indicating the total number of bytes received.
BytesReceived.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of bytes received from clients to this service root.

BytesSent.description: A property indicating the total number of bytes sent.
BytesSent.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of bytes sent from this service root to clients.

Closed.description: A counter indicating the total number of connections closed.
Closed.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of connections closed to this service root.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Opened.description: A counter indicating the total number of connections opened.
Opened.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of connections opened to this service root.

RequestProcessingLatencyMs.description: A property indicating the total time taken for all connections to generate response data.
RequestProcessingLatencyMs.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative time in milliseconds that any connection was processing a request.

RequestReadLatencyMs.description: A property indicating the total time taken for all connections to read request data.
RequestReadLatencyMs.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative time in milliseconds that any connection was reading a request.

RequestsReceived.description: A property indicating the total number of http requests received.
RequestsReceived.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of http requests received from clients to this service root.

ResponseCodes.description: A property indicating the total count for each return code.
ResponseCodes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of http responses sent for each return code from this service root.  Return codes not present in the collection can assumed to have a count of zero.

ResponseWriteLatencyMs.description: A property indicating the total time taken for all connections to send response data.
ResponseWriteLatencyMs.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative time in milliseconds that any connection was writing a response.

ResponsesSent.description: A property indicating the total number of http responses sent.
ResponsesSent.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of http responses sent to clients to this service root.

TLSHandshakeLatencyMs.description: A property indicating the total time taken for all connections to initiate a TLS session.
TLSHandshakeLatencyMs.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative time in milliseconds that any connection was initiating a TLS session.

OpenBMCManagerDiagnosticData.longDescription: OpenBMC OEM Extension for ManagerDiagnosticData providing info about http connections.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ConnectionStatistics.longDescription: Configuration describing which auth methods are enabled.

ReturnCode.description: HTTP connection statistics since last reset.
ReturnCode.longDescription: Object describing the HTTP connection statistics since last reset.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Count.description: A counter indicating the total number responses sent with this return code.
Count.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total cumulative number of responses sent with this return code since last reset.

HttpCode.description: The HTTP return code from rfc9110.
HttpCode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the http return code (200, 201, 500) that this statistic represents.

title: #OpenBMCConnectionStatistics.v1_0_0.ConnectionStatistics
